title: The biggest thing I hate about shaco players
body:
They literally just clown around all game. It's like their job is a game of jack in the box to them. Honestly, it's just a joke of a champion in general. Most of the time I don't even notice we have a Shaco on my team; he's just so invisible. And no, you're not hallucinating when they gank your lane immediately after their first camp. Don't let any shaco player deceive you- they're not trying to help you as a helpful gesture- they're in it because they play the game for shits and giggles.

Don't even get me started on {{champion:48}} players.

replies.body:
.

Take an upvote because i couldn't think of any way to flame you off the amount of iq i lost. {{sticker:sg-poppy}} {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
